reviews.review: a great game with great plot a great achievement over the first one
very well made and good game. would recommend 100/10

This game is perfect. No other way to say it. Every character is perfect. Every mechanic is perfect. Every puzzle is perfect. Every soundtrack is perfect. Every line of dialogue is perfect. Every setting is perfect. There isn't anything wrong with this game. Buy it. Do it. Now.
